name: Aguai Solutions Pvt Ltd
description:
Aguai Solutions is a Software Technology Solutions company that enables organizations gain competitive advantage through Technology Leadership.
We work as Technology Partner to Startup and Mid/Large Organizations across Healthcare and other industries.
We are an Agile Shop and we deliver using PDM (Product Development Methodology) there by bringing Predictability, Visiblity, Transperancy and Timely execution of all deliverables.
Innovation is key today for every business. We are the best Innovation partner for organization who want to understand how new and emerging technologies can help them innovate and compete and win markets!
